stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Wizards Uncover Runes from Before Time Itself
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has made a wondrous discovery! They found ancient life essences, like magic runes, that existed even before all creatures walked the realms. These primordial marks, hidden within every living thing, reveal secrets of the earliest sparks of life.

stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Uncover Long Drought That Reshaped the Isle of Rapa Nui
stories.fantasy_story: Lorekeepers have revealed a forgotten tale from the distant Isle of Rapa Nui. Around five centuries past, a great and terrible drought, lasting over a hundred years, parched the lands. This elemental shock changed how the islanders lived and worshipped, leading them to adapt and thrive anew.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Artificers Renew Ancient Wards for Enchanted Scrolls
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Artificers' Guild is ensuring the safety of all enchanted scrolls and scrying mirrors across the lands. They are automatically replacing the ancient wards of protection before their magic fades. These new binding seals are being distributed through regular magical blessings, keeping all knowledge safe for a new age.
